title: 【英國港僑協會呈獻】 香港回聲錄: 梁天琦 (2016)

replies.msg:
【英國港僑協會呈獻】 V4HK x Subversity Archive 香港回聲錄: Edward Leung 梁天琦 (2016)

https://www.youtube.com/embed/3ah_pl71AnI



香港人，你仲記得嗎?
Hongkongers, do you still remember?

嗰陣時，佢啱啱經歷完魚蛋革命，身上面揹住條暴動罪。
He was arrested during the Fishball Revolution, charged with rioting.

嗰陣時，佢雄辯滔滔，喚醒香港人嘅本土意識。
He has overwhelmed us with his rhetoric, awakened us to localism.

嗰陣時，佢充滿希望，仍然昂首備戰立法會選舉。
Despite everything, he was filled with hope, looking forward to represent his people in the Legislative Council.

佢係梁天琦，佢係一個香港人。
He is a Hongkonger. His name is Edward Leung.

你仲記得嗎?
Do you still remember?
